pageError.title: Error
pageError.description: An error occured while downloading this image.

alerts.imagesPerRow: Switched to {value, plural, =1 {single} =2 {double} other {{value}}} page mode.
alerts.viewportBound: Pages are bound to window height.
alerts.viewportUnbound: Pages are unbound from window height.
alerts.leftToRight: Pages are ordered left to right.
alerts.rightToLeft: Pages are ordered right to left.
alerts.singleCoverDisabled: Cover page is grouped with other pages.

descriptions.doujinshi: Self-published or self-distributed hentai manga or pornographic comic involving recognizable characters or mascots from other anime, manga or video games.
descriptions.manga: Officially published pornographic comic, typically featuring original content.
descriptions.artistCg: Artwork sets without panels, often made digitally, typically in full color.
descriptions.lightNovel: High-quality scanned images of light novels.

descriptions.questionable: Containing non-genital nudity, sexually suggestive acts, or something that is not generically considered pornographic.
descriptions.explicit: Containing exposed genitals, openly and unambiguously portrayed sex acts, or visible sexual fluids.

notFound.title: 404 Not Found
notFound.sub: Sorry, the request page {path} does not exist.
